snippet.title: PS Vita - Little Deviants official trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash your inner deviant on PS Vita.

Play with the Little Deviants in crazy mini-games using the PS Vita system's touchscreen, rear touch pad, microphone and more.

Grab some friends and enjoy multiplayer games for up to eight players via Pass Around mode.

Work with the Little Deviants and learn to use their abilities to boost your scores before sharing them with your friends.

Find out more at http://www.psvita.com
